long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly get your favorite NBA players' stats for the current season with this extension. Extension uses API calls to retrieve data for the user inputted player. The data is then formatted and displayed into a table if the player is currently playing this season. If they aren't a message pops up asking the user to enter a different player's name.
